mapper.select: select c.colorCode, p.productNo, c.colorType, p.productName, p.purchasePrice, p.productMainImg from color c, product p where c.colorType = #{colorN} and p.productNo=#{productNo};
select year from dailysalestats group by YEAR

select sum(totalPrice) as totalPrice, productNo, sum(orderQty) as orderQty, orderDate, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM orderDate ) as year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM orderDate ) as month, EXTRACT(DAY FROM orderDate ) as day from orderlist group by productNo, orderDate order by orderDate;

select sum(totalPrice) as totalPrice, productNo, sum(orderQty) as orderQty, orderDate, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM orderDate ) as year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM orderDate ) as month, EXTRACT(DAY FROM orderDate ) as day from orderlist group by productNo order by totalPrice;
select * from orderlist order by orderDate desc;
select sum(totalPrice) as totalPrice, memberId from dailysalestats group by memberId order by totalPrice desc;
select sum(totalPrice) as totalPrice, memberId, year,month,day from dailysalestats where orderdate between #{date1} and #{date2} group by memberId;
